Summary: Exelon (EXC) analyzed 2 bills with 10 direct impacts. Key impact: one 25% subsidy. Direct risk: -0.685. No indirect effects. Overall risk: moderate due to policy exposure.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any wind energy component produced and sold after December 31, 2027."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act imposes subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "This section shall not apply to any metallurgical coal produced after December 31, 2029."

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides 25% in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of any applicable critical mineral produced during calendar year 2033, 25 percent"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides 50% in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of any applicable critical mineral produced during calendar year 2032, 50 percent"

H.R. 1 - One Big Beautiful Bill Act provides 75% in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with long-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of any applicable critical mineral produced during calendar year 2031, 75 percent"
